vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PENNY_BY_PENNY.collect (patch_14.sol#40-46):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) (patch_14.sol#43)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_14.sol#44)
